From: "Talon Harvilicz" <wilddance_mare@...>

Rowdy Wolf:






With the wind blowing honestly, Rowdy Wolf stood at a hill, playing a type 
of cybertronic flute that resembled a panflute. He played the first notes 
like a gather of leaves racing across a field of long grasses, then he 
slowed the notes like drifting cherry blossoms. The heavy fur at his 
shoulders wavered with the wind. He played his song to the dying sun, as he 
sometimes did. He had this little instrument ever since he came on-line. It 
was there, a little piece of his history that he didn't understand. Maybe he 
was some sort of musician in his freetime, because he knew how to play it. 
He knew many songs, and played them to let the wild hear it. The wild was 
the only one that could. There was no bot out here to tell him if it was 
brilliant.
